body_html:
I have the same problem using virtualenv on El Cap as well.

As far as I can tell this issue is caused by the custom protobuf binary not containing the C++ implementations as claimed in the instructions. I have not been able to find libprotobuf.10.dylib in any of the locations pip installs packages to.

body:
I have the same problem using `virtualenv` on El Cap as well.

As far as I can tell this issue is caused by the custom protobuf binary not containing the C++  implementations as claimed in the [instructions](https://www.tensorflow.org/versions/r0.8/get_started/os_setup.html#common-problems). I have not been able to find `libprotobuf.10.dylib` in any of the locations pip installs packages to.
